Event.EventName: You accidentally go the wrong way down the aisle and a woman appears in the aisle walking the correct way! What do you do?

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: Turn around and pretend you were walking the right way
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: Phew didn't seem like she noticed...

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: Apologise and just sidestep to the side of the aisle so she goes past first
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: She thanks you for letting her past 0 0 10

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: Continue on, you were here first and the woman should move for you
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: You crash into her and are so embarrassed you make a run for it.
